name: Conditions
content:
SFRPG; Conditions (SRD)

@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Asleep} You take a -10 penalty to Perception checks to notice things. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleeding} You take the listed damage at the beginning of your turn.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blinded} You're flat-footed, you take a -4 penalty to most Str- and Dex-based skill checks and opposed Perception checks, you automatically fail Perception checks based on sight, opponents have total concealment against you, and you must succeed at a DC 10 Acrobatics check to move faster than half speed or else fall prone. @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.IBhv8b5jBFbVIYUR]{Broken} Weapon: attack and damage rolls take a -2 penalty and can't deal extra effects on a critical hit; armor: AC bonuses are halved and the armor check penalty is doubled; vehicle: -2 penalty to AC, collision DC, and Piloting modifier, and it halves its full speed and MPH; tool or tech that provides bonuses: bonuses are halved.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.8LdyXZl9PeXXFE8O]{Burning} You take the listed fire damage each round, and you must be extinguished to end the condition. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.8rIj0ewW4bL8Uph5]{Confused} You treat all creatures as enemies, and you must roll on the table to determine your actions.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4WXJOFZ4s7TJUW6D]{Cowering} You're flat-footed and can take no actions. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.2XWEujYSyryB4oHm]{Dazed} You can take no actions.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.YjE6UGzwOTfO9p4g]{Dazzled} You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and sight-based Perception checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nEJIWMKbPjqKuelo]{Dead} Your soul leaves your body, you can't act in any way, and you can't benefit from normal or magical healing.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.D8JvCEmOiWKe2UDx]{Deafened} You take a -4 penalty to initiative checks and opposed Perception checks, and you automatically fail sound-based Perception checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} You're unconscious, you can take no actions, and you must stabilize or lose Resolve Points and potentially die.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.OwZA6flUQPH0jPA0]{Encumbered} Speeds are reduced by 10 feet, maximum Dex bonus to AC is reduced to +2, and you take a -5 penalty to Str- and Dex-based checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nFBcsp5FS1Wi46Fc]{Entangled} You move at half speed; you cannot run or charge; and you take a -2 penalty to AC, attack rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Dex-based skill and ability checks.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhausted} You move at half speed; you cannot run or charge; you take a -3 penalty to AC, attack rolls, melee damage rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Str- and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you reduce your encumbered limit by 3 bulk. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.7PPRS6krnvaTHbxh]{Fascinated} You must pay attention to the fascinating effect and take a -4 penalty to skill checks made as reactions.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigued} You cannot run or charge; you take a -1 penalty to AC, attack rolls, melee damage rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Str- and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you reduce your encumbered limit by 1 bulk. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} You take a -2 penalty to AC, and you cannot take reactions or make attacks of opportunity.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} You must flee or fight, and you take a -2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4AkWDHGM6gHDepHN]{Grappled} You cannot move or take two-handed actions; you take a -2 penalty to AC, most attack rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you cannot make attacks of opportunity.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.RxvbSB9ZgSCBu2jw]{Helpless} Your Dex modifier is -5, and melee attacks against you gain a +4 bonus. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated} You're unable to attack, cast spells, or concentrate on spells, and the only action you can take is a single move action per turn.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter} You can't take move actions except to right yourself, you take a -2 penalty to attacks, and you're flat-footed. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target} You take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.11k3ObUIXEYFGrg9]{Overburdened} Speeds are reduced to 5 feet; maximum Dex bonus to AC is reduced to +0; and you take a -5 penalty to Str- and Dex-based checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked} You drop all held items; you flee at top speed; you cannot take other actions; you take a -2 penalty to ability checks, saving throws, and skill checks; and you cower if cornered.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralyzed} Your Dex modifier is -5, and you cannot move but can take mental actions. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XgK4EdO5D3Fj3iWz]{Pinned} You cannot move, you're flat-footed, and you take penalties to the same attributes as for grappled but the penalty is -4.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} You take a -4 penalty to melee attacks, a +4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks, and a -4 penalty to AC against melee attacks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} You take a -2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened} You take a -2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.H51jmhxF9XuwDOE7]{Stable} You're no longer dying, but you are still unconscious.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{Staggered} You can take only a single move or standard action each round and can't take reactions, but you can take swift actions as normal. @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunned} You drop everything held, you can't take actions, and you're flat-footed.
@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious} You're knocked out and helpless.
